description: After applying the security updates associated with CVE-2023-36400, users may encounter issues gaining system privileges on affected systems. This symptom may be observed particularly on Windows 10 version 22H2 and Windows 11 for x64-based systems, specifically builds 10.0.19045.3693 and 10.0.22621.2715 respectively. The KB articles related to this patch include KB-5032199, KB-5032192, KB-5032190, and KB-5032189, providing further insight into the critical updates needed to mitigate impact. Additionally, the associated security update is detailed in the Microsoft Update Guide.
